Package: de.unigoettingen.sub.be.ous.print.layout

[Groovy] Class Layout

    • de.unigoettingen.sub.be.ous.print.layout.Layout

    • This is the main class for layouts.

      Authors:
      cmahnke

      • Nested Class Summary

          Nested classes 
          Modifiers Name Description
          enum  Layout.PageSize A Enum representing page sizes A4 and A5, providing some JPS constants

          The URL of the path to search for files referenced in the XSL-FO file

          Internal property of the Layout2Fo to be used, used for debugging

      • Constructor Detail

        • @TypeChecked Layout(FORMAT inFormat, InputStream input, FORMAT outFormat, OutputStream output, URL xslfo, URL includePath, URL parser)

          Creates a Layout object

          Parameters:
          inFormat - the input FORMAT
          input - the InputStrem to read
          outFormat - the output FORMAT
          output - the OutputStream
          xslfo, - URL of the XLS-FO file to use
          includePath, - URL of the include path for references inside the XSL FO
          parser, - URL of the parser to use

      • Method Detail

        • @TypeChecked static File URLToFile(URL url)

          Converts a URL object into a file object

          returns:
          File representing the given URL

        • protected static File getFile(String path)

          Resolves relative file pathes

          returns:
          File the absolute File
          Parameters:
          path, - String the path to resolve

        • @TypeChecked protected LayoutParser getLayoutParser(URL parser)

          Internal function to get a LayoutParser for the given URL. Detects the Mime type of the file and can create LayoutParser objects for TXT (ASC) and XML reprentations

          returns:
          a LayoutParser object
          Parameters:
          - href='http://download.oracle.com/javase/6/docs/api/java/net/URL.html' title='URL'>URL of the layout representation

        • protected static URL getURL(String path)

          Resolves relative file pathes

          returns:
          a absolute URL
          Parameters:
          path, - String the path to resolve

        • @TypeChecked static String guessContentType(URL url)

          Guesses the content (Mime) type of the given URL, uses Apache Tika

          returns:
          String, containing the Mime type
          Parameters:
          - href='http://download.oracle.com/javase/6/docs/api/java/net/URL.html' title='URL'>URL of the file

        • def layout()

          Starts the layouting, writes to the given OutputStream

        • @TypeChecked static String readFile(URL input)

          Returns the contents of a given URL in codepage 858

          Returns:
          String the contents (converted from codepage 858 into UTF-8) of the given URL

        • @TypeChecked static String readFile(InputStream input)

          Returns the contents of a given InputStream in codepage 858

          Returns:
          String the contents (converted from codepage 858 into UTF-8) of the given InputStream

          returns:
